profile.title: Rushabh Bhatt
profile.subtitle: Specialist in data science, machine learning, and AI solutions with a focus on innovation and scalable system design
profile.currentWork: Designing and deploying robust ML solutions, advanced data analytics platforms, and AI-driven workflows for business and research use cases.
profile.currentLearn: Developing end-to-end ML/DL workflows: infra automation (Terraform), data ingest, model lifecycle, CI/CD, Agile deployment, monitoring, and retraining.
profile.collaborateOn: Open to collaborating on impactful industry projects, innovative hackathons, and applied research that drives measurable results.
profile.helpWith: Scalable AI architectures, cross-domain ML integrations, and automation strategies for efficient enterprise deployments.
profile.ama: Ask me about architecting ML solutions, model deployment on cloud, workflow automation, performance optimization, and scalable machine learning system design.
profile.funFact: My ML models train faster than my coffee brews, but both keep me running, sometimes the metrics even look more awake than I do!
